response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and innovation. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible, I am extending a special offer for you to acquire this product at a price of $15,000. This is an exclusive chance to own something truly exceptional. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 15000}
